requirements: Repair software bugs in the backlog
Identify and plan the implementation of change needs
Improve the processing of service requests
Ensure the availability of Datahub has improved usage
Maintain stable response times for Datahub's B2B interface
Ensure no noticeable increase in response times over time
Enhance monitoring of the use of the portal
Improve the quality of customer and address information
Reduce unnecessary updates to customer and contract information
Handle increased response times when processing large end customer contracts, especially in parallel
Manage occasional timeouts without preventing individual agreements
Address intermittent unreliability in the process related to the customer portal
Prevent background processes from getting stuck and ensure contract information is uploaded to the portal
Manage the filling of the Datahub database to avoid exceeding expected capacity
